description: Convert your Basic Flux to specific Crafting Materials!

ingredients.description: A low-value currency from across the Narrow Sea. Most Westerosi will not accept these coins, but merchants will exchange them for goods in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.
ingredients.name: Volantene Honor

ingredients.description: Exchange this in Inventory Recipes to get basic crafting materials, such as Wildfire or Hide. Flux recipes are useable in future events. Keep an eye on Inventory:Recipes for when these are enabled.  (Does not apply to trinket materials.)

description: Earn Night's Watch Trophies and Volantene Honors during the One Last Time event! This limited-time recipe will disappear when the Army of the Dead event is over.

ingredients.description: A low-value currency from across the Narrow Sea. Most Westerosi will not accept these coins, but merchants will exchange them for goods in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.
ingredients.name: Volantene Honor

ingredients.description:
Tokens of wood and bone, used by men of the Night's Watch to vote on matters of importance.

Can be used in Recipes during the Defend the Wall event, or converted to Trader's Scrip once the event ends.
ingredients.name: Night's Watch Trophy

Can be used in Recipes during the Weddings of Westeros event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Weddings of Westeros' Event

description: Spend your Wine Carafes before the event ends and this recipe disappears!

ingredients.description:
"One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms, I'd like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp's Delight. Only my close friends could drink it." - Tyrion Lannister

Can be used in Recipes during the Tyrion Lannister event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Tyrion Lannister' Event

"The remains of a frangible lance tip from a powerful blow - one can imagine the uproar of the crowd after such a hit!

Can be used in Recipes during the Tourney at Harrenhal event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Tourney at Harrenhal' Event"

Brutal weaponry given to the Sparrows to enact the will of the gods. Sparrows must give up their names and earthly possessions to become closer to the Seven.

Part of the 'Cersei Lannister' Event

Can be used in Recipes during the House Stark event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends.

Can be used in Recipes during the Lady of the Iron Islands event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Lady of the Iron Islands' Event

Can be used in Recipes during the Tourney at Harrenhal event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Tourney at Harrenhal' Event

ingredients.name: Volantene Honor

name: Recipe: 1 Brick

description: Spend your Animated Remains before the event ends and this recipe disappears!

ingredients.description:
"We can destroy them by burning them. And we can destroy them with dragonglass. If we don't win this fight, then that is the fate of every person in the world."

Can be used in Recipes during the March of the Dead event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'March of the Dead' Event

description:
During the ‘Feast of Cakes and Pies,’ gift Eel Pies containing resources to your friends. Use your own resources to bake Basic Eel Pies from inventory recipes. There’s no better way to show your appreciation to your allies across the realm! 

These limited-time recipes will disappear when the event is over.

ingredients.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

description:
Upgrade your Livestock to make the most of your dragon's appetite! 
This limited-time recipe will disappear when the event is over.

ingredients.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
ingredients.name: Livestock (Poor)

ingredients.description: A low-value currency from across the Narrow Sea. Most Westerosi will not accept these coins, but merchants will exchange them for goods in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.
ingredients.name: Volantene Honor

Part of the 'Brotherhood Without Banners' Event

ingredients.description:
The Red Keep was once known as the Aegonfort; a stockade atop a lonely hill above the Blackwater Bay. The surrounding township flourished under Aegon's rule and soon King's Landing became the greatest port city in all of Westeros.

Can be used in Recipes during the Aegon's Conquest event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Aegon's Conquest' Event
